amendment.description: Amendment sought to specify that proposed legislation designed to prevent fraud or abuse or to increase fiscal accountability of programs administered by the States or local governments shall not be considered as imposing an unfunded mandate.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to specify that proposed legislation designed to prevent fraud or abuse or to increase fiscal accountability of programs administered by the States or local governments shall not be considered as imposing an unfunded mandate. (text of the amendment was printed in the Congressional Record as amendment No. 144 on January 19, 1995.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A051) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 275 (Roll no. 76).
